definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The link is the growing strain on the world"s sole superpower. America is locked into a draining and demoralising war."
sentences.chinese: 这个联系就是全球唯一超级大国面临的压力日益增加。

sentences.english: The war demonstrates the duality of the anti-terrorism campaign and the strength of superpowers.
sentences.chinese: 战争显示了超级大国反恐的两重性及力量的两重性。

sentences.english: The answer is that they appropriated much of the wealth of a collapsing superpower.
sentences.chinese: 答案是他们侵吞了一个崩溃的超级大国的大量财富。

sentences.english: But is precocious superpowerdom even possible?
sentences.chinese: 但“早熟的”超级大国是否有可能出现？
超级大国正在玩弄强权政治。

sentences.english: They see themselves as pioneers, exploring the emerging superpower up close.
sentences.chinese: 他们视自己为先驱者，探索这个冉冉升起的超级大国。

sentences.english: War cry between two most dangerous Superpowers.
sentences.chinese: 战争在这两个最危险的超级大国间狂嗥。

sentences.english: But the superpower of the future?
sentences.chinese: 未来的超级大国在哪儿？

sentences.english: The margin of the superpowers over non-nuclear states had been widening .
sentences.chinese: 超级大国和非核国家之间的差距逐渐扩大了。

sentences.english: The superpowers are stockpiling bacteriological and biological weapons.
sentences.chinese: 超级大国在储备细菌武器和生化武器。

sentences.english: The fact is we're only guessing at what China might do as a superpower.
sentences.chinese: 事实是我们只能猜猜中国作为超级大国可能要做什么。

sentences.english: Because of its size, Russia has the resources to become a superpower.
sentences.chinese: 由于它的巨大版图，俄国有资源成为超级大国。

sentences.english: The superpowers never agreed to disarm.
sentences.chinese: 超级大国绝不同意裁军。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the world's superpower and the newest great power are nose to nose.
sentences.chinese: 突然间，世界超级大国和新兴强国兵刃相见。

sentences.english: But is China really going to be another superpower?
sentences.chinese: 但是，中国真的能成为另一个超级大国吗？

sentences.english: And a frugal American superpower is sure to have ripple effects around the globe.
sentences.chinese: 一个穷酸的美国超级大国必定要在全球产生连锁反应。

definition: permanent member state (of UN Security Council)
